name: FPS Training
description: FPS Training is a game designed to train your skills in FPS (First Person Shooter) games. The game includes a series of challenges that will train all of your skills, such as aiming, reflexes, recoil control and more!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or AMD Radeon HD 5570 or better DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 470 or AMD Radeon 6870 HD or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
